import React from 'react'; import { ADDRESS, EMAIL_ID, FIRST_NAME, GITHUB_USERNAME, LAST_NAME, LINKEDIN_USERNAME, RESUME_PATH, TWITTER_ID } from '../root.link' const Contact = () => { return (

Contact Me

I'd love to hear your thoughts!

{FIRST_NAME} {LAST_NAME}

{ADDRESS}

{EMAIL_ID}
Resume
LinkedIn
GitHub
Twitter
window.scroll(0, 0)}>
); }; export default Contact;
